content:
Even though I'm collecting drifting items,
the Candy Figurine Gift I'm offering in exchange is handmade by me,
and it's perfectly clean!

content:
So, what do you say?
Want to trade those drifting items you found
for some sweet candy treats?

content:
Ding ding!
I'm Titi, the Candy Person who rides the chaos,
collecting items all around the world!

content:

I'll recycle them into something useful!
